entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. A few flurries beginning this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
